Leomunds Tiny Hut was a column by Len Lakofka published in Dragon magazine. The series debuted in October 1979 (Dragon #30) and ended in April 1986 (Dragon #108).
The focus of the series was on "crunch", the game mechanics of Dungeons and Dragons, as well as exploring the backgrounds of artifacts, creatures, classes and spells. The column was named after the Leomunds tiny hut spell.
